title: Deciphering the dynamic interfacial chemistry of calcium metal anodes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Huijun Lin, Jiayi Meng, Weihua Guo, Renjie Li, Yuyang Yi, Yiyuan Ma, Chi Fai Cheung, Doron Aurbach, Zheng-Long Xu
Calcium (Ca) metal batteries, due to the high crustal abundance and potential for dendrite-free cycling of Ca, are promising alternative to current lithium battery chemistry. Ca deposition in aprotic organic...
